text: Welcome! We are a group of researchers interested in understanding what kinds of primary sources– that is, people, organizations, and documents – journalists draw from when writing news articles. In this task we ask you to read 5 news articles and evaluate a list of candidate primary sources we have identified for each article. For each candidate primary source, (1) answer whether it is cited in the article, (2) make corrections to the details of the source where necessary, and (3) finally add any primary sources cited in the article that were not included in the list. Please click on the annotation codebook link above and read all of the instructions carefully.
